import React, {Component} from 'react' import classes from './Pokemon.module.css' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import * as actions from '../../store/actions/index' import Spinner from '../UI/Spinner/Spinner' import PokemonType from './PokemonType/PokemonType' import PokemonStats from './PokemonStats/PokemonStats' import PokemonAbilities from './PokemonAbilities/PokemonAbilities' class Pokemon extends Component { componentDidMount(){ this.props.onLoadPokemon(this.props.match.params.id) } render(){ let card = if(!this.props.loading && this.props.pkm !==undefined){ card = (
{this.props.pkm.id}

{this.props.pkm.name.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(letter => letter.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + letter.substring(1))}


Attributes

Height: {this.props.pkm.height}

Weight: {this.props.pkm.weight}

) } return (
{card}
) } } const mapStateToProps = state =>{ return { pkm : state.pokemon.pokemon, loading: state.pokemon.loading, } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { onLoadPokemon: (id) => dispatch(actions.fetchPokemonById(id)), } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Pokemon)
